column2: First Trust/Aberdeen Global Opportunity Income Fund

First Trust/Aberdeen Global Opportunity Income Fund (the Fund) is a diversified, closed-end management investment company. The Fund's primary investment objective is to seek a high level of current income. As a secondary objective, the Fund seeks capital appreciation. The Fund pursues these objectives by investing its Managed Assets in the world bond markets through a diversified portfolio of investment grade and below-investment grade government and corporate debt securities. The Fund may invest up to 60% of its Managed Assets in non-investment grade securities. The Fund invest in various industries, including supranationals, government regional, real estate, wireless telecommunications services, financial services, pipeline, railroad, software and services, food and beverage, transportation and logistics, chemicals, communications equipment and home improvement. The Fund's investment advisor is First Trust Advisors L.P. The Fund's sub-advisor is Aberdeen Asset Management Inc.
